text: Vivien Killilea / Getty Images T. I. ( CNN ) - Kanye West has angered a lot of people with his Twitter rants, but fellow rapper T. I. is not willing to turn his back on him. ` ` We, as the black delegation, can not afford to lose Kanye West,'' T. I. said during an interview Wednesday. ` ` He is our Michael Jackson.'' T. I. sat down with New York radio hosts ` ` The Breakfast Club'' and talk turned to West. The pair teamed up on ` ` Ye vs. The People,'' a song in which they debate West's support of President Donald Trump. T. I. said it was the fastest he has ever recorded a song and it came after a four -
